section.name: Pull Tools
section.p: Pull tools are a key part of Turbine. They allow you to put generic objects into the context for use in velocity templates.
Some of the most useful pull tools are

tr.td: org. apache. turbine. services. pull. tools. TemplateLink
Provides access to form fields and validation data
Holds variables to describe the page (note these need to be included in your HTML if you want this to work).
org. apache. turbine. util. template. HtmlPageAttributes
Provides URL generation for links to images and non turbine pages
org. apache. turbine. services. pull. tools. ContentTool

section.p: To find out how they work check out the Turbine or Penguin javadoc.
You can call any java function on the class.
